"https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/tree/master/data/timeseries"

load_url <- function(url) {
    temp_file <- tempfile(fileext = ".xlsx")
    download.file(url = url, destfile = temp_file, mode = "wb", quiet = TRUE)
    loadWorkbook(temp_file)
}

oxford <- load_url("https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/tree/master/data/timeseries")
